1: -module(amp_SUITE).
    2: %% @doc Tests for XEP-0079 Advanced Message Processing support
    3: %% @reference <a href="http://xmpp.org/extensions/xep-0079.html">XEP-0079</a>
    4: %% @author <simon.zelazny@erlang-solutions.com>
    5: %% @copyright 2014 Erlang Solutions, Ltd.
    6: %% This work was sponsored by Grindr.com
    7: 
    8: -compile([export_all]).
    9: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   10: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   11: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus_xmlns.hrl").
   12: -include_lib("exml/include/exml.hrl").
   13: 
   14: all() ->
   15:     [{group, discovery}
   16:     ,{group, rule_errors}
   17:     ,{group, notify_action}
   18:     ,{group, error_action}
   19:     ,{group, rules_dont_apply}
   20:     ,{group, multiple_rules}
   21:     ].
   22: 
   23: groups() ->
   24:     [{discovery, [stream_feature_test
   25:                  ,initial_service_discovery_test
   26:                  ,actions_and_conditions_discovery_test]}
   27: 
   28:     ,{rule_errors, [unsupported_actions_test
   29:                    ,unsupported_conditions_test
   30:                    ,unacceptable_rules_test]}
   31: 
   32:     ,{notify_action, [notify_deliver_direct_test
   33:                      ,notify_deliver_forward_test
   34:                      ,notify_deliver_none_test
   35: 
   36:                      ,notify_match_resource_any_test
   37:                      ,notify_match_resource_exact_test
   38:                      ,notify_match_resource_other_test
   39:                      ]}
   40:     ,{error_action, [error_deliver_direct_test
   41:                     ,error_deliver_forward_test
   42:                     ,error_deliver_none_test
   43:                     ]}
   44:     ,{rules_dont_apply, [error_deliver_doesnt_apply_test]}
   45:     ,{multiple_rules, [last_rule_applies_test]}
   46: 
   47:     ].
   48: 
   49: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   50:     escalus:init_per_suite(Config),
   51:     escalus:create_users(Config, {by_name, [alice, bob]}).
   52: 
   53: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   54:     escalus:delete_users(Config, {by_name, [alice, bob]}),
   55:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   56: 
   57: init_per_testcase(CaseName,Config) ->
   58:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName,Config).
   59: 
   60: end_per_testcase(CaseName,Config) ->
   61:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName,Config).
   62: 
   63: stream_feature_test(Config) ->
   64:     Alice = escalus_users:get_options(Config, alice),
   65:     {ok, _, Props, Features} = escalus_connection:start(Alice),
   66:     true = escalus_session:can_use_amp(Props, Features).
   67: 
   68: initial_service_discovery_test(Config) ->
   69:     escalus:story(
   70:       Config, [{alice, 1}],
   71:       fun(Alice) ->
   72:               escalus_client:send(Alice, disco_info(Config)),
   73:               Response = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
   74:               escalus:assert(has_feature, [ns_amp()], Response)
   75:       end).
   76: 
   77: actions_and_conditions_discovery_test(Config) ->
   78:     escalus:story(
   79:       Config, [{alice, 1}],
   80:       fun(Alice) ->
   81:               escalus_client:send(Alice, disco_info_amp_node(Config)),
   82:               Response = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
   83:               assert_has_features(Response,
   84:                                   [ns_amp()
   85:                                   ,<<"http://jabber.org/protocol/amp?action=notify">>
   86:                                   ,<<"http://jabber.org/protocol/amp?action=error">>
   87:                                   ,<<"http://jabber.org/protocol/amp?condition=deliver">>
   88:                                   ,<<"http://jabber.org/protocol/amp?condition=match-resource">>
   89:                                   ])
   90:       end).
   91: 
   92: 
   93: unsupported_actions_test(Config) ->
   94:     escalus:story(
   95:       Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}],
   96:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
   97:               %% given
   98:               Msg = amp_message_to(Bob, [{deliver, direct, drop}],  % drop is unsupported
   99:                                    <<"A paradoxical payload!">>),
  100:               %% when
  101:               client_sends_message(Alice, Msg),
  102: 
  103:               % then
  104:               client_receives_error(Alice, {deliver, direct, drop}, <<"unsupported-actions">>)
  105:       end).
  106: 
  107: unsupported_conditions_test(Config) ->
  108:     escalus:story(
  109:       Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}],
  110:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  111:               %% given
  112:               %% expire-at is unsupported
  113:               Msg = amp_message_to(Bob, [{'expire-at', <<"2020-06-06T12:20:20Z">>, notify}],
  114:                                    <<"Never fade away!">>),
  115:               %% when
  116:               client_sends_message(Alice, Msg),
  117: 
  118:               % then
  119:               client_receives_error(Alice, {'expire-at', <<"2020-06-06T12:20:20Z">>, notify},
  120:                                    <<"unsupported-conditions">>)
  121:       end).
  122: 
  123: unacceptable_rules_test(Config) ->
  124:     escalus:story(
  125:       Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}],
  126:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  127:               %% given
  128:               Msg = amp_message_to(Bob, [{broken, rule, spec}
  129:                                         ,{also_broken, rule, spec}
  130:                                         ],
  131:                                    <<"Break all the rules!">>),
  132:               %% when
  133:               client_sends_message(Alice, Msg),
  134: 
  135:               % then
  136:               client_receives_error(Alice, [{broken, rule, spec}
  137:                                            ,{also_broken, rule, spec}],
  138:                                     <<"not-acceptable">>)
  139:       end).
  140: 
  141: 
  142: notify_deliver_direct_test(Config) ->
  143:     escalus:story(
  144:       Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}],
  145:       fun(Alice,Bob) ->
  146:               %% given
  147:               Msg = amp_message_to(Bob, [{deliver, direct, notify}],
  148:                                 <<"I want to be sure you get this!">>),
  149:               %% when
  150:               client_sends_message(Alice, Msg),
  151: 
  152:               % then
  153:               client_receives_notification(Alice, Bob, {deliver, direct, notify}),
  154:               client_receives_message(Bob, <<"I want to be sure you get this!">>)
  155:       end).
  156: 
  157: notify_deliver_forward_test(Config) ->
  158:     escalus:story(
  159:       Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}],
  160:       fun(Alice,Bob) ->
  161:               %% given
  162:               BobsBareJid = escalus_client:short_jid(Bob),
  163:               Msg = amp_message_to(BobsBareJid, [{deliver, forward, notify}],
  164:                                    <<"One of your resources needs to get this!">>),
  165:               %% when
  166:               client_sends_message(Alice, Msg),
  167: 
  168:               % then
  169:               client_receives_notification(Alice, BobsBareJid, {deliver, forward, notify}),
  170:               client_receives_message(Bob, <<"One of your resources needs to get this!">>)
  171:       end).
  172: 
  173: notify_deliver_none_test(Config) ->
  174:     escalus:story(
  175:       Config, [{alice, 1}],
  176:       fun(Alice) ->
  177:               %% given
  178:               StrangerJid = <<"stranger@localhost">>,
  179:               Msg = amp_message_to(StrangerJid, [{deliver, none, notify}],
  180:                                    <<"A message in a bottle...">>),
  181:               %% when
  182:               client_sends_message(Alice, Msg),
  183: 
  184:               % then
  185:               client_receives_notification(Alice, StrangerJid, {deliver, none, notify})
  186:       end).
  187: 
  188: notify_match_resource_any_test(Config) ->
  189:     escalus:story(
  190:       Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 4}],
  191:       fun(Alice,Bob,_,_,_) ->
  192:               %% given
  193:               Msg = amp_message_to(Bob, [{'match-resource', any, notify}],
  194:                                    <<"Church-encoded hot-dogs">>),
  195:               %% when
  196:               client_sends_message(Alice, Msg),
  197: 
  198:               % then
  199:               client_receives_notification(Alice, Bob, {'match-resource', any, notify}),
  200:               client_receives_message(Bob, <<"Church-encoded hot-dogs">>)
  201:       end).
  202: 
  203: notify_match_resource_exact_test(Config) ->
  204:     escalus:story(
  205:       Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 4}],
  206:       fun(Alice,_,_,Bob3,_) ->
  207:               %% given
  208:               Msg = amp_message_to(Bob3, [{'match-resource', exact, notify}],
  209:                                    <<"Resource three, your battery is on fire!">>),
  210:               %% when
  211:               client_sends_message(Alice, Msg),
  212: 
  213:               % then
  214:               client_receives_notification(Alice, Bob3, {'match-resource', exact, notify}),
  215:               client_receives_message(Bob3, <<"Resource three, your battery is on fire!">>)
  216:       end).
  217: 
  218: notify_match_resource_other_test(Config) ->
  219:     escalus:story(
  220:       Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}],
  221:       fun(Alice,Bob) ->
  222:               %% given
  223:               NonmatchingJid = <<"bob@localhost/unknownresource">>,
  224:               Msg = amp_message_to(NonmatchingJid,
  225:                                    [{'match-resource', other, notify}],
  226:                                     <<"A Bob by any other name!">>),
  227: 
  228:               %% when
  229:               client_sends_message(Alice, Msg),
  230: 
  231:               % then
  232:               client_receives_notification(Alice, NonmatchingJid, {'match-resource', other, notify}),
  233:               client_receives_message(Bob, <<"A Bob by any other name!">>)
  234:       end).
  235: 
  236: error_deliver_direct_test(Config) ->
  237:     escalus:story(
  238:       Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}],
  239:       fun(Alice,Bob) ->
  240:               %% given
  241:               Msg = amp_message_to(Bob, [{deliver, direct, error}],
  242:                                    <<"I want to be sure you don't get this!">>),
  243:               %% when
  244:               client_sends_message(Alice, Msg),
  245: 
  246:               % then
  247:               client_receives_error(Alice, Bob, {deliver, direct, error}, <<"undefined-condition">>),
  248:               client_receives_nothing(Bob)
  249:       end).
  250: 
  251: error_deliver_forward_test(Config) ->
  252:     escalus:story(
  253:       Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}],
  254:       fun(Alice,Bob) ->
  255:               %% given
  256:               BobsBareJid = escalus_client:short_jid(Bob),
  257:               Msg = amp_message_to(BobsBareJid, [{deliver, forward, error}],
  258:                                    <<"This cannot be forwarded!">>),
  259:               %% when
  260:               client_sends_message(Alice, Msg),
  261: 
  262:               % then
  263:               client_receives_error(Alice, BobsBareJid, {deliver, forward, error}, <<"undefined-condition">>),
  264:               client_receives_nothing(Bob)
  265:       end).
  266: 
  267: error_deliver_none_test(Config) ->
  268:     escalus:story(
  269:       Config, [{alice, 1}],
  270:       fun(Alice) ->
  271:               %% given
  272:               StrangerJid = <<"stranger@localhost">>,
  273:               Msg = amp_message_to(StrangerJid, [{deliver, none, error}],
  274:                                    <<"This cannot possibly succeed">>),
  275:               %% when
  276:               client_sends_message(Alice, Msg),
  277: 
  278:               % then
  279:               client_receives_error(Alice, StrangerJid, {deliver, none, error}, <<"undefined-condition">>)
  280:       end).
  281: 
  282: error_deliver_doesnt_apply_test(Config) ->
  283:     escalus:story(
  284:       Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}],
  285:       fun(Alice,Bob) ->
  286:               %% given
  287:               Msg = amp_message_to(Bob, [{deliver, none, error}],
  288:                                    <<"Hello, Bob!">>),
  289:               %% when
  290:               client_sends_message(Alice, Msg),
  291: 
  292:               % then
  293:               client_receives_message(Bob, <<"Hello, Bob!">>),
  294:               client_receives_nothing(Alice)
  295:       end).
  296: 
  297: 
  298: last_rule_applies_test(Config) ->
  299:     escalus:story(
  300:       Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}],
  301:       fun(Alice,Bob) ->
  302:               %% given
  303:               BobsBareJid = escalus_client:short_jid(Bob),
  304:               Msg = amp_message_to(BobsBareJid, [{deliver, direct, error},
  305:                                                  {deliver, none, error},
  306:                                                  {deliver, forward, notify}],
  307:                                    <<"One of your resources needs to get this!">>),
  308:               %% when
  309:               client_sends_message(Alice, Msg),
  310: 
  311:               % then
  312:               client_receives_notification(Alice, BobsBareJid, {deliver, forward, notify}),
  313:               client_receives_message(Bob, <<"One of your resources needs to get this!">>)
  314:       end).
  315: 
  316: 
  317: 
  318: %% Internal
  319: ns_amp() ->
  320:     <<"http://jabber.org/protocol/amp">>.
  321: 
  322: client_goes_offline(Client) ->
  323:     escalus_client:stop(Client).
  324: 
  325: client_sends_message(Client, Msg) ->
  326:     escalus_client:send(Client, Msg).
  327: 
  328: client_receives_error(Client, Rules, AmpErrorKind) when is_list(Rules) ->
  329:     Received = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Client),
  330:     assert_amp_error(Client, Received, Rules, AmpErrorKind);
  331: client_receives_error(Client, Rule, AmpErrorKind) ->
  332:     client_receives_error(Client, [Rule], AmpErrorKind).
  333: 
  334: client_receives_error(Client, IntendedRecipient, Rule, AmpErrorKind) ->
  335:     Received = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Client),
  336:     assert_amp_error_with_full_amp(Client, IntendedRecipient,
  337:                                    Received, Rule, AmpErrorKind).
  338: client_receives_nothing(Client) ->
  339:     timer:sleep(300),
  340:     escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Client).
  341: 
  342: client_receives_message(Client, MsgText) ->
  343:     Received = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Client),
  344:     escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [MsgText], Received).
  345: 
  346: client_receives_notification(Client, IntendedRecipient, Rule) ->
  347:     Msg = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Client),
  348:     assert_notification(Client, IntendedRecipient, Msg, Rule).
  349: 
  350: disco_info(Config) ->
  351:     Server = escalus_config:get_config(ejabberd_domain, Config),
  352:     escalus_stanza:disco_info(Server).
  353: disco_info_amp_node(Config) ->
  354:     Server = escalus_config:get_config(ejabberd_domain, Config),
  355:     escalus_stanza:disco_info(Server, ns_amp()).
  356: 
  357: assert_amp_error(Client, Response, Rules, AmpErrorKind) when is_list(Rules) ->
  358:     ClientJID = escalus_client:full_jid(Client),
  359:     Server = escalus_client:server(Client),
  360:     Server = exml_query:attr(Response, <<"from">>),
  361:     ClientJID = exml_query:attr(Response, <<"to">>),
  362:     escalus:assert(fun contains_amp/5,
  363:                    [amp_status_attr(AmpErrorKind), no_to_attr, no_from_attr, Rules],
  364:                    Response),
  365:     escalus:assert(fun contains_amp_error/3,
  366:                    [AmpErrorKind, Rules],
  367:                    Response);
  368: 
  369: assert_amp_error(Client, Response, Rule, AmpErrorKind) ->
  370:     assert_amp_error(Client, Response, [Rule], AmpErrorKind).
  371: 
  372: assert_amp_error_with_full_amp(Client, IntendedRecipient, Response,
  373:                                {C,V,A} = Rule, AmpErrorKind) ->
  374:     ClientJID = escalus_client:full_jid(Client),
  375:     RecipientJID = full_jid(IntendedRecipient),
  376:     Server = escalus_client:server(Client),
  377:     Server = exml_query:attr(Response, <<"from">>),
  378:     ClientJID = exml_query:attr(Response, <<"to">>),
  379:     escalus:assert(fun contains_amp/5,
  380:                    [amp_status_attr(AmpErrorKind), RecipientJID, ClientJID, [Rule]],
  381:                    Response),
  382:     escalus:assert(fun contains_amp_error/3,
  383:                    [AmpErrorKind, [Rule]],
  384:                    Response).
  385: 
  386: 
  387: assert_notification(Client, IntendedRecipient, Response, {_C,_V,A} = Rule) ->
  388:     ClientJID = escalus_client:full_jid(Client),
  389:     RecipientJID = full_jid(IntendedRecipient),
  390:     Server = escalus_client:server(Client),
  391:     Action = a2b(A),
  392:     Server = exml_query:attr(Response, <<"from">>),
  393:     ClientJID = exml_query:attr(Response, <<"to">>),
  394:     escalus:assert(fun contains_amp/5,
  395:                    [Action, RecipientJID, ClientJID, [Rule]],
  396:                    Response).
  397: 
  398: assert_has_features(Response, Features) ->
  399:     CheckF = fun(F) -> escalus:assert(has_feature, [F], Response) end,
  400:     lists:foreach(CheckF, Features).
  401: 
  402: full_jid(#client{} = Client) ->
  403:     escalus_client:full_jid(Client);
  404: full_jid(B) when is_binary(B) ->
  405:     B.
  406: 
  407: %% @TODO: Move me out to escalus_stanza %%%%%%%%%
  408: %%%%%%%%% Element constructors %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  409: amp_message_to(To, Rules, MsgText) ->
  410:     Msg0 = #xmlel{children=C} = escalus_stanza:chat_to(To, MsgText),
  411:     Msg = escalus_stanza:set_id(Msg0, escalus_stanza:id()),
  412:     Amp = amp_el(Rules),
  413:     Msg#xmlel{children = C ++ [Amp]}.
  414: 
  415: amp_el([]) ->
  416:     throw("cannot build <amp> with no rules!");
  417: amp_el(Rules) ->
  418:     #xmlel{name = <<"amp">>
  419:           ,attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>, ns_amp()}]
  420:           ,children = [ rule_el(R) || R <- Rules ]
  421:           }.
  422: 
  423: rule_el({Condition, Value, Action}) ->
  424:     check_rules(Condition, Value, Action),
  425:     #xmlel{name = <<"rule">>
  426:           ,attrs = [{<<"condition">>, a2b(Condition)}
  427:                    ,{<<"value">>, a2b(Value)}
  428:                    ,{<<"action">>, a2b(Action)}]}.
  429: 
  430: %% @TODO: Move me out to escalus_pred %%%%%%%%%%%%
  431: %%%%%%%%% XML predicates %%%%% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  432: contains_amp(Status, To, From, ExpectedRules, Stanza) when is_list(ExpectedRules)->
  433:     Amp = exml_query:subelement(Stanza, <<"amp">>),
  434:     undefined =/= Amp andalso
  435:         To == exml_query:attr(Amp, <<"to">>, no_to_attr) andalso
  436:         From == exml_query:attr(Amp, <<"from">>, no_from_attr) andalso
  437:         Status == exml_query:attr(Amp, <<"status">>, no_status_attr) andalso
  438:         all_present([ rule_el(R) || R <- ExpectedRules ], exml_query:subelements(Amp, <<"rule">>)).
  439: 
  440: contains_amp_error(AmpErrorKind, Rules, Response) ->
  441:     ErrorEl = exml_query:subelement(Response, <<"error">>),
  442:     <<"modify">> == exml_query:attr(ErrorEl, <<"type">>)
  443:         andalso
  444:         amp_error_code(AmpErrorKind) == exml_query:attr(ErrorEl, <<"code">>)
  445:         andalso
  446:         undefined =/= (Marker = exml_query:subelement(ErrorEl, amp_error_marker(AmpErrorKind)))
  447:         andalso
  448:         ns_stanzas() == exml_query:attr(Marker, <<"xmlns">>)
  449:         andalso
  450:         undefined =/= (Container = exml_query:subelement(ErrorEl, amp_error_container(AmpErrorKind)))
  451:         andalso
  452:         all_present([ rule_el(R) || R <- Rules ], exml_query:subelements(Container, <<"rule">>)).
  453: 
  454: all_present(Needles, Haystack) ->
  455:     list_and([ lists:member(Needle, Haystack)
  456:                || Needle <- Needles ]).
  457: 
  458: 
  459: list_and(List) ->
  460:     lists:all(fun(X) -> X =:= true end, List).
  461: 
  462: ns_stanzas() ->
  463:     <<"urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:xmpp-stanzas">>.
  464: 
  465: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  466: 
  467: check_rules(deliver, none, notify) -> ok;
  468: check_rules(deliver, forward, notify) -> ok;
  469: check_rules(deliver, direct, notify) -> ok;
  470: 
  471: check_rules(deliver, direct, error) -> ok;
  472: check_rules(deliver, forward, error) -> ok;
  473: check_rules(deliver, none, error) -> ok;
  474: 
  475: check_rules('match-resource', any, notify) -> ok;
  476: check_rules('match-resource', exact, notify) -> ok;
  477: check_rules('match-resource', other, notify) -> ok;
  478: 
  479: check_rules(deliver, direct, drop) -> ok;        %% for testing unsupported rules
  480: check_rules('expire-at', _binary, notify) -> ok; %% for testing unsupported conditions
  481: check_rules(broken, rule, spec) -> ok;           %% for testing unacceptable rules
  482: check_rules(also_broken, rule, spec) -> ok;      %% for testing unacceptable rules
  483: 
  484: check_rules(C,V,A) -> throw({illegal_amp_rule, {C, V, A}}).
  485: 
  486: a2b(B) when is_binary(B) -> B;
  487: a2b(A) -> atom_to_binary(A, utf8).
  488: 
  489: %% Undefined-condition errors return a fully-fledged amp element with status=error
  490: %% The other errors have 'thin' <amp>s with no status attribute
  491: amp_status_attr(<<"undefined-condition">>) -> <<"error">>;
  492: amp_status_attr(_)                         -> no_status_attr.
  493: 
  494: amp_error_code(<<"undefined-condition">>) -> <<"500">>;
  495: amp_error_code(<<"not-acceptable">>) -> <<"405">>;
  496: amp_error_code(<<"unsupported-actions">>) -> <<"400">>;
  497: amp_error_code(<<"unsupported-conditions">>) -> <<"400">>.
  498: 
  499: amp_error_marker(<<"not-acceptable">>) -> <<"not-acceptable">>;
  500: amp_error_marker(<<"unsupported-actions">>) -> <<"bad-request">>;
  501: amp_error_marker(<<"unsupported-conditions">>) -> <<"bad-request">>;
  502: amp_error_marker(<<"undefined-condition">>) -> <<"undefined-condition">>.
  503: 
  504: amp_error_container(<<"not-acceptable">>) -> <<"invalid-rules">>;
  505: amp_error_container(<<"unsupported-actions">>) -> <<"unsupported-actions">>;
  506: amp_error_container(<<"unsupported-conditions">>) -> <<"unsupported-conditions">>;
  507: amp_error_container(<<"undefined-condition">>) -> <<"failed-rules">>.
